channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rep. Huizenga to Newsmax: Better for US Not to Take Military Action Against Iran
item.description: It is much preferable that the United States stay out of any military activity against Iran in the current war, Rep. Bill Huizenga told Newsmax on Tue...

item.title: Report: DHS Lifts Pause on Workforce Site Raids
item.description: The U.S. Department of Homeland Security on Monday told staff it will reverse guidance issued last week that agents were not to conduct immigration ra...

item.title: Democrat group betting on anti-ICE fear in new campaign ad targeting young men
item.description: New political advertisement from Progress Action Fund portrays ICE agents forcibly removing a U.S. citizen during a date, targeting swing districts ah...

item.title: Blue state lawmaker rallies around mask ban for federal agents as ICE operations ramp up
item.description: California State Sen. Scott Wiener introduces the No Secret Police Act to ban law enforcement from covering faces amid increased ICE arrests and prote...

item.title: New: Trump Gives Bombshell 1 AM Presser, Slams Emmanuel Macron, Slaps Down 'Ceasefire' Reports
Former Coast Guard Officer Arrested for Allegedly Making Numerous Trump Assassination Threats
Trump Shares Huckabee's Lengthy Text Message of Praise
item.description: On his social media site, President Donald Trump shared a screenshot of the text from Mike Huckabee, the U.S. ambassador to Israel.

item.title: Dems Plot to Stop Trump's 'Pocket Rescission'
item.description: Democrats are gearing up to stop President Donald Trump's use of "pocket rescission" to cut waste, fraud, and abuse.

item.title: Menendez to report to prison for 11-year term for corruption
item.description: Former Sen. Bob Menendez, a Democrat from New Jersey, to report to federal prison on an 11-year sentence in a sweeping bribery and corruption scandal.

item.title: Reagan-nominated federal judge accuses Trump admin of 'discrimination' with cuts to NIH diversity grants

item.title: Trump Contradicts Gabbard on Iranian Nuclear Weapons
item.description: President Donald Trump contradicted his Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard, Tuesday, on Iran's nuclear weapons capabilities.

item.title: Why did Trump leave G7 early? 'Much bigger' than Iran cease-fire, he says

item.title: Unintentionally Funny Hot Takes on 'No Kings' Protest, Featuring Hillary Clinton
